entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DAC fails to enumerate heap objects on .NET 7+ due to GC Regions #96568
  • Linux: `System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo`: With `UseShellExecute = true`, a misleading exception is thrown when no helper utility (such as `xdg-open`) is present. #96565
  • MarshalMode.ElementOut expects a ConvertToUnmanged function to exist #96564
    9.0.0
  • JSON doesn't skip unused properties #96559
  • NativeAOT packages contain two copies of msbuild files #96556
  • [browser][MT] RuntimeError: memory access out of bounds #96546
    9.0.0
  • [browser][mt] RangeError: Invalid atomic access index #96545
    9.0.0
  • Remove or relax the length limitation of Uri #96544
    Future
  • System.Text.Json Source Generator throws "CS0306: Type“ReadOnlySpan<byte> cannot be used as type argument" on certain class due to unknown reason #96540
  • An idea for supporting cancellation in `RandomAccess` on Unix #96530
  • Solution with mixed Framework/Core/Standard libraries gives errors for Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions v6.0.4 #96529
    6.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: Diagnostic method information #96528
  • After Using System.Text.Json, Code Execution Differs in PublishAot. #96548
  • Arm64: Reconsider the register order for vector registers #96527
    9.0.0
  • Returning a ReadOnlySpan<byte> from a LibraryImport fails #96525
    Future
  • Performance regression in .Net 8.0 from unreachable conversion of Span to string. #96524
  • [mono] stackoverflow exception hit thread mode assert #96523
  • [API Proposal]: Add `ThrowIfOutOfRange` helper method to `System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException` #96522
  • Resiliency problem: unable to abort hanging threads #96519

Closed

  • System.Memory referencing old version of System.Runtime.CompilerService.Unsafe and GAC #96533
    Future
  • PGO for Memmove unrolling #84192
    Future
  • Consider making Interlocked.And and friends into JIT intrinsics #32239
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add MinValue/MaxValue to INumber #96534
  • [NETSDKE2E] CoreFX symbols are missing while debugging IL Symbols on MacOS #96475
  • JIT assert on Unix in `ReturnTypeDesc::InitializeStructReturnType` #96461
    9.0.0
  • Request support for the ISO 8601 standard 24:00:00 time format in .net #96536
  • Corrupted function parameter value in Release configuration (overwritten by the first argument value). #96306
    9.0.0
  • NativeAOT Protect #96543
  • Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.AspNetCore depends on deprecated package System.Drawing.Common #96535
  • `JsonPropertyInfo.AttributeProvider` is null when using `JsonSerializerContext` #96387
  • Native AOT `StackFrame` method info #92869
  • [iOS] `System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentCulture` is not respected #95692

PullRequests

Created

  • Replace LINQ's ArrayBuilder, LargeArrayBuilder, and SparseArrayBuilder with new SegmentedArrayBuilder #96570
    area-System.Linq, 9.0.0
  • NativeAOT implement warning as errors as a compiler feature #96567
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix Crossgen2 PDB generation (again) #96566
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove IV analysis quirk in loop cloning #96563
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix native memory leak on OCSP_Response #96561
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [RISC-V] Enable On Stack Replacement #96558
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove `BBJ_RETURN` loop cloning quirk #96555
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Limit PNSE by overwriting comparer type - `HybridGlobalization` #96554
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Limit PNSE by using default comparer in `HybridGlobalization` #96541
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Set `s_naiveThreshold` to `const` in the release build. #96538
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Convert HELPER_METHOD_FRAME to QCalls (5/N) #96526
    needs-area-label

Merged

  • PGO: Profile Buffer.Memmove's length #96311
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Intrinsify Interlocked.And and Interlocked.Or on XARCH #96258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix Crossgen2 PDB generation (again) #96518
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Replace call to GetFalseTarget method with GetTarget inside fgRemoveConditionalJump #96560
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove unnecessary lexical preconditions in loop cloning #96553
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix source_file bug in mono_ppdb_lookup_location_internal #96497
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Document JitDisasm and JitLateDisasm #96468
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove some small loop cloning quirks #96552
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix double handling of call operands when importing intrinsic #96557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose DOTNET_JitDebuggable as a public configuration option #96457
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [HybridGlobalization] Fix xamarin_macios build after system ICU change #96270
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Precise reflection-visible delegate target analysis #96166
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Refactor exception trackers #96505
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Home float parameters before integer parameters #96439
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Build Windows NativeAOT runtime packs #96509
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove compaction renumbering quirk #96478
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove loop unrolling quirks #96477
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono][RISC-V] Lowering and output more OP for Regression test #96368
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • decommit regions on huge free list in aggressive mode #96513
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Upstreaming typo from runtimelab #96520
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable test when running under GCStress #96508
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-enhancement, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Updating Sum() implementation for Vector128 and Vector256 + adding lowering for Vector512 #95568
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • UInt64.CreateSaturating<Int128> truncates instead of saturates #96369
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fixing SignedXml.CheckSignature for enveloped signature with `#xpointer(/)` Reference #95404
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Use multi-reg load/store for EncodeToUtf8 #95513
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] fix CaptureContextFromParameter and SealJSImportCapturing #96504
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono][amd64] Fix Vector128 relational comparison API's for nuint type #96515
    area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • Avoid copy action for root assemblies #96363
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Adding vectorized implementations of Log2 to Vector64/128/256/512 #96455
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Adding osx-arm64 Mono Interpreter runtime tests job to extra-platforms #96023
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [browser][HybridGlobalization] Improve speed performance of IndexOf and LastIndexOf text APIs with HybridGlobalization mode #95583
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • Use pattern value in the summary for the generated regex method. #96488
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • ObjWriter in C# #95876
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Check opportunistic ISAs in crossgen for CompExactlyDependsOn #90326
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix clsHnd in impImportCall #93176
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP][mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT mini job on extra platforms #96332
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Reintroduce case sensitive comparison optimization for FrozenDictionary in some cases #95232
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Experiment: Minopts lsra #96386
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix generic signature issue when calling non generic method of closed generic type #96517
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Remove defunct netfx tests #96435
    area-Meta
  • Recover from failed OCSP download. #96448
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] GT_STORE_BLK - do not call memset for blocks containg gc pointers on heap #96514
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Turn on TargetSupportsWritingFieldData for Wasm #2477
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Remove unix file Internal\Runtime\FrozenObjectHeapManager.Unix.cs #2476

PullRequests

Merged

  • Merge dec23 #2473

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to install .NET 8 SDK on Alpine following official instructions #37790

Closed

  • Error message for `dotnet workload` is an exception #32620
    .NET 8.0
  • Multi-version dotnet tool installed #27050

PullRequests

Created

  • Include MSBuild version as part of --info, not every build. #37804
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [Blazor] Disable accelerated builds in Visual Studio for Blazor webassembly projects (7.0) #37794
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [Blazor] Disable accelerated builds in Visual Studio for Blazor webassembly projects (6.0) #37793
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [Wasm] Disable accelerated builds in Visual Studio for wasm projects #37791
    untriaged, Area-WasmSdk
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37786
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Simplify and improve signature verification for workloads on Windows #37782
    Servicing-approved

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37779
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade for different versions for dotnet tool install #37311
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use workload sets as per user request #37681
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Added test for .user file in outer build #37192
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add dotnet-format to the SDK repo #37717
    Area-Format

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal]: Dictionary expressions #7822

Closed

  • [Proposal]: request support for the ISO 8601 standard 24:00:00 time format in C# #7816
  • C#: foreach breaking when the IEnumerator.MoveNext method throws exceptions #7818

PullRequests

Created

  • Disallow method parameter conversion of `ref` to `in`/`ref readonly` #7820

Updated

  • Collection expressions: require applicable constructor and Add method for target type implementing IEnumerable #7802
  • Create spec for const expressions for is patterns #7589

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Change signature throws ArgumentException #71512
  • RemoteWorkspaceManager SimpleAssemblyLoader doesn't respect codeBasePath #71510
  • PEVerify/ILVerify test helpers should make sure that verification errors are obtained in English regardless of the current UI culture. #71509
  • CS8509 Doesn't flag nullable enums correctly #71508
  • The type name 'Empty' does not exist in the type 'Guid' #71504

Closed

  • IDE0004 erroneously says a collection expression cast is redundant #71511
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34505.47 #71513
  • System.InvalidOperationException with 2 complicated global alias's in a row #71502
  • Feature 'Semantic classification' is currently unavailable due to an internal error #71505
  • IDE0251 doesn't factor in InlineArrays #71500
    Next
  • IDE0305 codefix generates invalid code #71427

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce allocations in VB's PENamedTypeSymbol #71515
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move to 8.0 #71507
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Start local function analysis in unreachable state #71506
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix remove-unnecessary-cast with collection expressions. #71514
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix sorting of global aliases #71503
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Do not offer to make a member readonly if it potentially writes into an inline-array field. #71501
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fallback to a no-op nav-to searcher when one is not exported. #71499
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2346258 #71498
  • [Port][Inline Rename] Cosmetic improvements to Rename Suggestions (#71478) #71495
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2346062 #71491

Updated

  • Improve parsing performance with large collection expressions of numbers #71443
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add handling of params collections for natural delegate types #71334
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` #70971
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Params Collections - Adjust binding in presence of dynamic arguments #71421
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • IDE0220 (foreach cast): Consider T of IEnumerable<T> for weakly-typed GetEnumerator #63472
    Area-IDE, Community, 17.10
  • Remove WPF dependencies from Workspace and Features test layers #71392
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Separate the process of creating an event accessor parameter and the process of figuring out its type. #71497
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Do not throw exceptions when we can't make a doc id #71451
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move TestWorkspace to Workspace test layer, add EditorTestWorkspace to EditorFeatures layer #71407
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • EditorConfig comments cannot follow a property value #51625
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Editor Config
  • Fix semantic model for target typed collection expression elements #71496
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets: fix inline statement snippets in a "qualified name" edge case #71246
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: report specific error (if any) for explicit cast failure #71492
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Clarify semi-required properties #59047
    Area-IDE
  • Add severity filter to Fix All operations #71486
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use Microsoft.VisualStudio.Sdk meta-package and clean up versions and package references #71111
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations when creating CompositeText instances. #71493
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: Break Solution-checksums into a checksums for pure-state vs source-generator state #71396
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move background initialization to OnAfterPackageLoadedAsync #71047
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Params Collections: misc chanages #71423
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add EndPoint #53183
  • Perf regression: updates #53181
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #53180
  • [StringLength] Attribute makes nullable string required in blazor #53179
  • Theme: .NET 9 is the best platform for Cloud Native development #53178
    9.0.0
  • Missing trailing backslash after pathBase when Path is empty #53177
  • VS2022 17.8.3 very slow to build Blazor web app .NET 8 #53176
  • Scaffold + Google authentication does not sign out the google account on Logout #53175
  • When Http2Limits.HeaderTableSize set to zero results in COMPRESSION ERROR (9) #53174
  • Blazor Web Assembly Stand Alone generates connection reset exceptions #53172
  • AuthenticationStateProvider custom implementation in .NET 8 #53182
  • Make it possible to resolve the method info from the specific delegate type when using AddRouteHandler #53171
    9.0-preview1
  • How to get the GET account/2fa and POST account/2fa in dotnet 8 identity endpoints. #53169
  • Blazor InputSelect does not select the value when using SSR #53167
  • SignalR prevents .NET8 app to stop if clients are connected #53165
  • Blazor 8 + Firefox routing issue - NS_ERROR_NET_RESET #53164
  • Not possible to call JavaScript method #53161

Closed

  • MultipartFormDataContent with CancellationToken Error #53092
  • Perf regression: fortunes, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #53160
  • [Blazor WebAssembly] Create performance benchmarks for Blazor against other UI frameworks #23571
    Backlog
  • Blazor custom router is broken on .Net 8 #53135
  • Routing issues or just by design? #53130
  • ASP.NET Core over HTTP.SYS changes the redirect URL in 302 response to HTTPS protocol #53149
  • ControllerFeatureProvider throws System.Reflection.ReflectionTypeLoadException: "Unable to load one or more of the requested types. Could not load type 'Npgsql.Internal.TypeHandling.TypeHandlerResolverFactory' #53134
  • SignalR ReactJS multiple connections #53163
  • Perf regression: fortunes, mapaction, multiple_queries #53148
  • OutputCaching Middleware #40232
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Support resolving MethodInfo from strongly-typed route handler delegate #53184
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, feature-rdf
  • InputBase should clear validation message store on Dispose for dynamic forms #53162
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • Set all mac job timeouts to 90 minutes #53173
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Update other packages to bundle with rollup #53117
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1
  • Use Microsoft.AspNetCore.InternalTesting.csproj for _GetPackageVersionInfo #53152
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Remove _GetPackageVersionInfo from Npm.Workspace.nodeproj #53153
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [Blazor] Centralize our JS build setup #53150
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Auto render mode improvements #53159
    area-blazor
  • Always install node & build node components in CI #53154
    area-infrastructure
  • Using FrozenDictionaries in IEndpointAddressScheme implementations #52854
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [release/6.0] [Blazor] Fix duplicated place holder in log message #53009
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] [Blazor] Fix `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.props` not getting packed correctly #52973
    area-blazor, ask-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] [Blazor] Fix `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.props` not getting packed correctly #52972
    area-blazor, ask-mode, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.props` not getting packed correctly #52971
    area-blazor, ask-mode, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix NavigationManager.Refresh() on SSR-only pages #52767
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix misdetection of component comments #52744
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Use SHA256 for RPM digest #53157
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Use SHA256 for RPM digest #53158
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Harden SignatureEquals nullability checks #53052
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • fileprovider fails to open file with write permission #19722
  • [Windows] CollectionView Inserting item at position 0 triggers a redraw #19721
  • Safe Area not working for iOS #19720
  • Project Requires Installation of .Net Workloads: Maui-Tizen #19719
  • Setting RequestedTheme to Dark on Windows means minimise, maximise and close buttons are not visible #19718
  • Title: hello issues #19717
  • Unable to debug IOS share extension or notification service extension #19716
  • RefreshView is not initialized properly on Windows platform #19715
  • Unable to start program debug #19714
  • MAUI: Shell FlyoutHeader disables the click/selection of first Flyout item on iOS #19712
  • SearchBar never lose focus #19711
  • Net Maui Windows Titlebar color is not working as expected #19709
  • Net Maui on platform Windows PointerOver and Selected states is not working together ? #19708
  • Project setup did not work #19706
  • [NETSDKE2E]With NET 8.0.200 preview SDK installed, Error "NU3004: The package is not signed." for Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Aspire.Manifest-8.0.100.8.0.0-preview.3.24054.2 happens when installing workloads. #19704

Closed

  • Unexpected exception from VisualTreeElementExtensions.GetVisualTreeElements #19701
  • Crash detection in build script is off-by-one #19703
  • [UItest] Windows Device Tests don't appear to be running full set of categories #19565
    .NET 8 SR2

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix disappearing cell issue for TableView on Android #19723

Merged

  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #19700
  • [Windows] Fix verification of test count in CI #19697

Updated

  • [macOS] Fix `GesturePlatformManager.CalculatePosition` when asked for a relative position #19371
    community ✨, area/gestures
  • Clean up async assertions #19385
  • Remove calls to scoped services on root provider #19593
    area/hosting 🧩
  • [net8.0] Update with main #19381
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net9.0] Enable tizen #19679

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Sql Server - LINQ Contains returns false positive results for string values larger than column size #32735
  • Annotate the 1st part of the query pipeline for trimming #32734
  • Class name conflict when generating compiled model #32733
  • NullReferenceException in Get-Migration in EF Core 8 #32732
  • SQL Server Migrations - SqlOperation.Sql is stripped of all empty lines #32730
  • Adding related identity issues Update command instead of Insert with entity.HasKey(e => e.OtherId) setting #32728
  • Analyzer to warn about dynamic queries (incompatible with precompilation) #32727
  • ThenInclude with GroupBy unexpected behavior #32725

Closed

  • Which is the best methods to test EF Core based applications #32724
  • Error with Primitive Collection and Outer/Cross Apply it #32477

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Don't try to cast negative enum values to ulong #32731
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Don't detect join table with other incoming references as a simple join table #32729
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Add a note about testing on non en-US #32726

Updated

  • Automatic use of C# primary constructors #32509

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-05
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #18107
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Use SHA256 for RPM digest #18111
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Use SHA256 for RPM digest #18112
